00465 typedef struct QTimeEvtTag {
00469     QEvent super;
00470 
00473     struct QTimeEvtTag *prev;
00474 
00477     struct QTimeEvtTag *next;

00512 void QTimeEvt_ctor(QTimeEvt *me, QSignal sig);
00513 
00532 #define QTimeEvt_postIn(me_, act_, nTicks_) do { \
00533     (me_)->interval = (QTimeEvtCtr)0; \
00534     QTimeEvt_arm_((me_), (act_), (nTicks_)); \
00535 } while (0)
00536 
00558 #define QTimeEvt_postEvery(me_, act_, nTicks_) do { \
00559     (me_)->interval = (nTicks_); \
00560     QTimeEvt_arm_((me_), (act_), (nTicks_)); \
00561 } while (0)
00562
